
name(The Radical & The Monster)

snap(20,10,-25)
sky(105,180,255)
fog(221,161,141)
clouds(250,185,157,1)
ground(200,168,141,0,0.1,0.1) //ground(r,g,b,textureNum,addedHueChangeFactor,addedSatChangeFactor)
lightswingX(10)
distfog(10000)

tip(Now you have unlocked and can use Radical One in this stage;)
tip(Radical One is a spectacular all round car that also has)
tip(amazing aerial capabilities.)
tip(You can race or waste in this stage but stay cautious;)
tip(DR Monstaa is not an easy adversary!)

nlaps(3)
